column4: Preferably, I would like to be able to use CS4  use/ save files that can be accessed by ubuntu and CS4 . I have a 320gb hdd and 4gb ram
that probably rules out wine right there, since according to http://appdb.winehq.org, photoshop under cs4 doesn't run under wine....
as for dual-boot vs. virtualbox, it comes down to whether you need to run linux and windows simultaneously or not/
